channel.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
channel.description: How could I go about opening one of my songs (copied to my computer from Windows Media Player) with a .bat file?? I've tried a couple of different things, and every time they say it is not "a recognized internal or external command" or something.

item.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

z0mg it worked, <3 Javac.

Read full topic
item.source: Opening up a file with a .bat?

item.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Put quotes around anything that has spaces in the path (BUT DON’T QUOTE THE ARGS!!!):
[pre]
“C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe” /prefetch:6 /Play “C:\My Custom Music Player Songs\My Chemical Romance\The Black Parade\01 The End.mp3”[/pre]

Read full topic
item.source: Opening up a file with a .bat?

item.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

[quote=“BobDole81, post:7, topic:33790”] C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe /prefetch:6 /Play "c:\path\to\file.mp3" [/quote]

I do:

	C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe /prefetch:6 /Play "C:\My Custom Music Player Songs\My Chemical Romance\The Black Parade\01 The End.mp3"

I get this:

'C:\Program' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
You are now listening to "The End.", by My Chemical Romance.
Do you want to go back? If so, type in 1.

How do I make it recognize how to open the Program Files folder?

Read full topic
item.source: Opening up a file with a .bat?

item.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

C:\Program Files\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe /prefetch:6 /Play "c:\path\to\file.mp3"

item.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

@echo off
title Server
“c:/ bleh bleh”
pause

Up.

item.title: Opening up a file with a .bat?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

@echo off
title Server
-Name of File-
pause

Worked for me.

Read full topic
